sqls.sql: SELECT id, purchase_order_id, purchase_order_code, goods_id, goods_code, goods_name, goods_generic_name, goods_specification, goods_place, packing_amount, preparation_id, unit_id, (select name from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary d where d.`category`="preparation_id" and d.`value` = preparation_id ) as preparation_name, (select name from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary d where d.`category`="unit_id" and d.`value` = unit_id ) as unit_name, quantity, goods_unit_price, goods_retail_price, amount, receipt_quantity, consignee, manufacturer, registration_code, remark, creater_id, creater_name, modifier_id, modifier_name, create_time, update_time FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_detail where purchase_order_id = ${key}

SELECT id, purchase_order_id, purchase_order_code, goods_id, goods_code, goods_name, goods_generic_name, goods_specification, goods_place, packing_amount, preparation_id, unit_id, (select name from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary d where d.`category`="preparation_id" and d.`value` = preparation_id ) as preparation_name, (select name from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary d where d.`category`="unit_id" and d.`value` = unit_id ) as unit_name, quantity, goods_unit_price, goods_retail_price, amount, receipt_quantity, consignee, manufacturer, registration_code, remark, creater_id, creater_name, modifier_id, modifier_name, create_time, update_time FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_detail where purchase_order_id = ${key} and purchase_order_id != '0'

SELECT id, code, supplier_id, supplier_code, supplier_name, salesperson_name, salesperson_tel, purchaser_id, purchaser_code, purchaser_name, status, creater_id, creater_code, creater_name, approver_id, approver_code, approver_name, purchase_time, finish_time, appoint_time, remark, modifier_id, modifier_code, modifier_name, amount, create_time, update_time FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order where id=${key}

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order(
id,
code,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
supplier_name,
salesperson_name,
salesperson_tel,
purchaser_id,
purchaser_code,
purchaser_name,
status,
creater_id,
creater_code,
creater_name,
approver_id,
approver_code,
approver_name,
finish_time,
appoint_time,
remark,
modifier_id,
modifier_code,
modifier_name,
amount,
purchase_time, create_time, update_time, ) values(
${id},
${code},
${supplier_id},
${supplier_code},
${supplier_name},
${salesperson_name},
${salesperson_tel},
${purchaser_id},
${purchaser_code},
${purchaser_name},
${status},
${creater_id},
${creater_code},
${creater_name},
${approver_id},
${approver_code},
${approver_name},
${finish_time},
${appoint_time},
${remark},
${modifier_id},
${modifier_code},
${modifier_name},
${amount},
now(), now(), now(), )

insert into saas_serial_number(type, date, num ) select 'pur_order_num', now(), IFNULL((select num FROM saas_serial_number WHERE type = 'pur_order_num' and to_days(date) = to_days(now()) order by num desc LIMIT 0,1),0)+1 as num;
SELECT CONCAT('CGDD',DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d'),LPAD(num,4,'0')) AS code FROM saas_serial_number WHERE type = 'pur_order_num' and to_days(date) = to_days(now()) order by num desc LIMIT 0,1;
SELECT CASE WHEN ${test8} = '[]' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS mustBreak

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_detail(
purchase_order_id,
purchase_order_code,
goods_id,
goods_code,
goods_name,
goods_generic_name,
goods_specification,
goods_place,
packing_amount,
preparation_id,
unit_id,
quantity,
goods_unit_price,
goods_retail_price,
amount,
receipt_quantity,
consignee,
manufacturer,
registration_code,
remark,
creater_id,
creater_name,
modifier_id,
modifier_name,
create_time, update_time, ) values(
${keyProperty},
${code},
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.goods_name},
${test8.goods_generic_name},
${test8.goods_specification},
${test8.goods_place},
${test8.packing_amount},
${test8.preparation_id},
${test8.unit_id},
${test8.quantity},
${test8.goods_unit_price},
${test8.goods_retail_price},
${test8.quantity}*${test8.goods_unit_price},
${test8.receipt_quantity},
${test8.consignee},
${test8.manufacturer},
${test8.registration_code},
${test8.remark},
${creater_id},
${creater_name},
${modifier_id},
${modifier_name},
now(), now(), )
update SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order set amount= (select IFNULL(sum(amount), 0) from SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_detail where purchase_order_id = ${keyProperty}) where id=${keyProperty}

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_detail(
purchase_order_id,
purchase_order_code,
goods_id,
goods_code,
goods_name,
goods_generic_name,
goods_specification,
goods_place,
packing_amount,
preparation_id,
unit_id,
quantity,
goods_unit_price,
goods_retail_price,
amount,
receipt_quantity,
consignee,
manufacturer,
registration_code,
remark,
creater_id,
creater_name,
modifier_id,
modifier_name,
create_time, update_time, ) values(
${key},
${code},
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.goods_name},
${test8.goods_generic_name},
${test8.goods_specification},
${test8.goods_place},
${test8.packing_amount},
${test8.preparation_id},
${test8.unit_id},
${test8.quantity},
${test8.goods_unit_price},
${test8.goods_retail_price},
${test8.amount},
${test8.receipt_quantity},
${test8.consignee},
${test8.manufacturer},
${test8.registration_code},
${test8.remark},
${creater_id},
${creater_name},
${modifier_id},
${modifier_name},
now(), now(), )

update SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order set
id=${id},
code=${code},
supplier_id=${supplier_id},
supplier_code=${supplier_code},
supplier_name=${supplier_name},
salesperson_name=${salesperson_name},
salesperson_tel=${salesperson_tel},
purchaser_id=${purchaser_id},
purchaser_code=${purchaser_code},
purchaser_name=${purchaser_name},
status=${status},
creater_id=${creater_id},
creater_code=${creater_code},
creater_name=${creater_name},
approver_id=${approver_id},
approver_code=${approver_code},
approver_name=${approver_name},
purchase_time=${purchase_time},
finish_time=${finish_time},
appoint_time=${appoint_time},
remark=${remark},
modifier_id=${modifier_id},
modifier_code=${modifier_code},
modifier_name=${modifier_name},
amount=${amount},
create_time=${create_time},
update_time=${update_time},
where id=${key}
update SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order set amount= (select IFNULL(sum(amount), 0) from SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_detail where purchase_order_id = ${key}) where id=${key}

select count(a.s_id) channelsid from saas_purchase_order a where 1=1
and create_time >= ${startTime}
and create_time <= ${endTime}
and s_id like %${s_id}%
and pinyin_code like %${pinyin_code}%
and code like %${code}%
and order_states like %${order_states}%
update SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order set status = '2' where id= ${id}
update SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_detail set status = '2' where purchase_order_id= ${id}

delete from SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_detail where
purchase_order_id= ${key}
SELECT CASE WHEN '1' = status THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS mustBreak FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order WHERE id = ${id}
SELECT CASE WHEN b.count > 0 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS mustBreak from (select count(*) as count FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order_detail WHERE purchase_order_id = ${id} and status = '1')b
SELECT CASE WHEN status = 2 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS mustBreak from SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order WHERE id = ${id}

condition.title: 订单状态
condition.name: status
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'purchase_order_states'

condition.title: 订单类型
condition.name: order_type
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'purchase_order_type'

condition.name: status
condition.title: 订单状态
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'purchase_order_states'

step.breakMessage: 该订单已取消不能取消！

condition.name: status
condition.title: 订单状态
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'purchase_order_states'
